Name:
Niels Juel

Fate:

Sold for scrap, 1952

Armament:
10 × 150 mm (5.9 in) guns
2 × 57 mm (2.2 in) AA guns
2 × 450 mm (17.7 in) torpedo tubes
Armor:
Belt: 155–195 mm (6.1–7.7 in)
Deck: 55 mm (2.2 in)
Gun shields: 50 mm (2.0 in)
Conning tower: 170 mm (6.7 in)
Bulkheads: 165 or 175 mm (6.5 or 6.9 in)
